Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
Manage all the components of the server like matches, players and connections.

      Create a new open match to fill.
      Parameters:
      numOfPlayer - the number of player of the match.
      player - the player that created the match.
      Throws:
      java.security.InvalidParameterException - if the parameters of the match are invalid.
